alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 10 at 8:14AM AKDT until June 10 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR YUKON DELTA... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 10 PM AKDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA... * TIMING...Noon to 10 PM today. * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...54 to 74. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
